name: start
description: You stumble through the long grass, across the open field, the sunbaked scrub whipping at your bloodied legs.
Something clanks metallically on your hip. Ripping it from your belt, you peer at it, struggling to focus your eyes in the gloom.
choice:
It is...
[1] ...the blackiron twist blade you lifted from the sellsword in the tavern?
[2] ...a silver timepiece?
[3] ...a string of rusted prayer beads?
exit_choice:
Where do you go?
Dungeon
Wizard tower
Caravan
